meanings.definition: A structure consisting of two layers.
meanings.sent1: The sandwich had two bilayers of bread, making it extra filling.
meanings.sent2: The book had a cover with bilayers of different colors, making it stand out on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so tall that it looked like it had bilayers of frosting reaching the sky.
meanings.sent4: The forest was dense with trees, creating a bilayer of green canopy above.
meanings.sent5: The painting depicted a serene lake with bilayers of mountains reflected in the water.

meanings.definition: A double layer of lipid molecules.
meanings.sent1: The cell membrane is made up of bilayers that protect the cell.
meanings.sent2: The scientist observed the bilayers under the microscope to study their structure.
meanings.sent3: The chef carefully spread the sauce in bilayers on the pizza, creating a delicious flavor profile.
meanings.sent4: The ocean waves crashed against the shore, resembling bilayers of frothy foam.
meanings.sent5: The soap bubbles floated in the air, forming delicate bilayers that shimmered in the sunlight.
